text: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلۡوَعۡدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

translation.en: And mention in the Book, Ishmael. Indeed, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger and a prophet
translation.id: Dan ceritakanlah (Muhammad) kisah Ismail di dalam Kitab (Alquran). Dia benar-benar seorang yang benar janjinya, seorang rasul dan nabi
